abstract.t: This document describes a file system federation protocol that enables file access and namespace traversal across collections of independently administered fileservers. The protocol specifies a set of interfaces by which fileservers and collections of fileservers with different administrators can form a fileserver federation that provides a namespace composed of the filesystems physically hosted on and exported by the constituent fileservers. <Tewari, et al.> Expires June 12, 2008 [page 2] Internet-Draft draft-tewari-nfsv4-federated-fs-protocol-00 December 2007 1
